channel.title: I neeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeed help =O
channel.description:
Well im running a 562 server. when my player attacks a npc with melee its fine. correct animation etc. however when i try to use magic or range against a npc it just...doesnt attack at all, no matter how many times you click "attack" it just wont do it.
can some1 help me with this or post a link please?
